content:
# Welcome to a new edition of Gimbalabs Live Coding session, brought to you by andamio.io.

![](https://ucarecdn.com/525aaddb-0680-430e-9e83-696922568ba4/)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271366%27%20height=%27768%27/%3e)
![Welcome to a new edition of Gimbalabs Live Coding session, brought to you by andamio.io.](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2F206a7e95-ec57-402b-b534-a1d8d2297494%2F&w=3840&q=75)

In *Live Coding*, you'll learn things like: **Minting your own assets**! The process involves:

Go to <https://meshjs.dev/apis/transaction/minting>

In the "Minting Assets" section, on the right side, you'll see a panel named "Mint assets and send to recipients". Just go there.

Fill in the fields "Address", "Asset name", "Asset label" (what is "fungible"), and "Quantity".

Connect your preprod Wallet ("preprod?")

Click on "Run code snippet"

And voila! Tokens in your wallet!

Question: did you feel the need to be a developer to start doing things in Cardano? Neither did we. Come and learn a little bit more.

Live Coding session: Weds and Thrus 14:30 UTC. Zoom link here: <https://gimbalabs.com/calendar>

![https://gimbalabs.com/calendar/](https://ucarecdn.com/741a1b16-5e92-4344-8956-e2a243a4149d/)

![https://gimbalabs.com/calendar/](https://ucarecdn.com/741a1b16-5e92-4344-8956-e2a243a4149d/)

And, one more thing: Start taking the Plutus PBL right now. <https://plutuspbl.io/>

![https://plutuspbl.io/](https://ucarecdn.com/4b8dd602-2e7d-4c1a-9436-b58170befae8/)

![https://plutuspbl.io/](https://ucarecdn.com/4b8dd602-2e7d-4c1a-9436-b58170befae8/)
